vulnerabilities.title: Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS)
vulnerabilities.description: The lodash package before 4.17.21 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (ReDoS) via a regular expression.
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Upgrade lodash to version 4.17.21 or later

vulnerabilities.title: Code Injection
vulnerabilities.description: The lodash package before 4.17.21 allows attackers to inject arbitrary code.
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Upgrade lodash to version 4.17.21 or later

vulnerabilities.title: Prototype Pollution
vulnerabilities.description: The lodash package before 4.17.21 allows attackers to perform prototype pollution via a crafted object.
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Upgrade lodash to version 4.17.21 or later

vulnerabilities.title: Prototype Pollution
vulnerabilities.description: The lodash package before 4.17.21 allows attackers to perform prototype pollution via a crafted object.
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Upgrade lodash to version 4.17.21 or later

vulnerabilities.title: Prototype Pollution
vulnerabilities.description: The lodash package before 4.17.21 allows attackers to perform prototype pollution via a crafted object.
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Upgrade lodash to version 4.17.21 or later
